<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Find a viable user for \\c V in \\c Insts, which should all be contained in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\c BB. This may also create some new instruction in \\c BB and use that.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/randomirbuilder/#a993771e7c58c60044cbc4c57f689406e">connectToSink</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &amp;BB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;Instruction &#42;&gt;</a> Insts,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">                             <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;V);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Create a user for \\c V in \\c BB.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/randomirbuilder/#a679d0966b3083f647af785f24936d3d9">newSink</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &amp;BB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;Instruction &#42;&gt;</a> Insts, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;V);</span></CodeLine>
